news.title: OpenAI's spending spree is powering the tech industry. Oracle is the latest winner
news.summary: OpenAI's influence across Silicon Valley is growing. Oracle’s stock surge and Broadcom's breakout underscore OpenAI's impact. OpenAI was founded in 2009 and is based in California.

news.title: UnitedHealth soars but Berkshire's new stake may still be in the red
news.summary: Buffett drops four notches on Forbes 400 ranking. Berkshire's new UnitedHealth stake, Kraft Heinz falls as overhang looms, Buffett says. Buffett: "I don't think it's a good time to buy a company"

news.title: $7 trillion 'wall of cash' worry is looming for investors once Fed interest rate cuts start
news.summary: Trillions of dollars are parked in money market funds due to years of high rates. With the Fed poised to cut, portfolio moves will need to be made.

news.title: From bananas to toys, these 5 charts show how much costs have risen since Trump's tariffs went into effect
news.summary: Inflation has been showing up in categories that rarely see big swings. Since Trump’s tariffs took effect in April, inflation has shown up in several categories.

news.title: Chinese EV players take fight to legacy European automakers on their home turf
news.summary: Chinese electric carmakers Xpeng and GAC this week signalled aggressive expansion plans in Europe. Chinese electric carmaker Xp Peng and carmaker GAC have announced plans to expand across Europe.

news.title: Oracle’s not-so-secret weapon that’s helped it quickly take on the cloud giants
news.summary: Larry Ellison, now Oracle’s CTO, has played a major role in helping the company win AI cloud deals and pivot beyond legacy software.

news.title: Donald Trump Jr.’s new career: Advising companies
news.summary: The president’s eldest son is being paid for giving his counsel. From mixed martial arts to prediction markets and drones, the president's eldest son gives his advice.

news.title: My husband sold his IRA without my knowledge prior to our divorce. Is this legal?
news.summary: “Is it legal for one member of a married couple to authorize the sale of an IRA in a joint-managed account?”

news.title: We’re 37 and want to have a multimillion-dollar compound for our kids. Is that a realistic goal?
news.summary: “My government and pension check will be $10,000 a month,” he says. “I’m going to be able to retire at the age of 70.”

news.title: Trump looks set to delay the TikTok ban again. Why there’s no U.S. buyout deal yet.
news.summary: President Donald Trump is expected to give another lifeline to TikTok next week. His administration's efforts to get the Chinese-controlled app to sell off its U.S. operations appear still to be caught up in broader trade negotiations with Beijing.
